usage.cn: 尽管还不曾离开，我已对你朝思暮想！
usage.eng: I miss you so much already and I haven't even left yet!

usage.cn: 最好的感觉是当你朝他看过去时，他已经在凝视着你。
usage.eng: The best feeling is when you look at him and he is already staring.

usage.cn: 有时候，虽然能想明白，但心里就是接受不了。
usage.eng: Sometimes our hearts just need time to accept what our heads already know.

usage.cn: 最痛苦的一种再见是从未说出口，但心里却清楚，一切都已结束。。。
usage.eng: The most painful goodbyes are the ones never said, but the heart already knows it's over.
